title: Digital Self-Directed Learning Program for English Phonemic Awareness and Pronunciation Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English pronunciation and phonemic awareness skills
context.additional_context: Advanced English phonetics training program for pre-service/in-service teachers, featuring evidence-based learning design utilizing digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can recognize five English phonemes (pseudowords) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can explain the articulatory positions of phonemes in English word pronunciation with 80% accuracy.
Learners can self-evaluate their pronunciation improvement process by analyzing fNIRS-based brain activation patterns.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
